companies.name: Perplexity AI
companies.reason: Known for its AI-powered web search engine that processes user queries to provide accurate and concise answers. It has gained significant media attention for innovations in AI technologies and reached major milestones, including 10 million monthly active users and a successful Series A funding round.

companies.name: FlutterFlow
companies.reason: A development platform for building cross-platform mobile applications, FlutterFlow has rapidly gained adoption among businesses and developers. It raised substantial funding and continues to expand its footprint in the app development market.

companies.name: Cohere
companies.reason: Operates in the artificial intelligence sector, building foundational models for natural language processing. It recently hit a valuation of $6.8 billion and is recognized for meaningful contributions to advancements in AI technology.
